page.title: 17Leisure Time in Newmillerdam
page.content: Unless you enjoy the countryside and walking there is little opportunity to pursue any leisure time activity in the area. For the young people there is a thriving youth club at Kettlethorpe School but the community centre in Kettlethorpe Hall next to the school is now closed. You can go fishing in the lake at the Country Park or for walks or bird watching. The Wakefield (Woodthorpe Golf Club) is in the area to the north of the Park. An l8 hole course with a par of 72.It offers a challenge to local golfers. There is a cricket team based at the Pledwick Well Inn and one at Chevet. There is also a selection of public houses which from the outside try to maintain a traditional character.
